content.description: The writer is working on a revision of the passage and has written the following thesis statement for it.
content.question: Based on the evidence from Tyler’s studies, it is clear that this condition was the primary reason for da Vinci’s success.Which of the following is most likely the main claim that the writer is planning to make in the new version of the passage?

choices.label: The only way for an artist to be successful is to have exotropia.
Da Vinci was more successful as an artist than others who also had exotropia.
The only way to fully understand an artist’s work is to study the artist’s physical conditions.
Da Vinci was a great artist because he had exotropia.

content.answer: Da Vinci was a great artist because he had exotropia.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Write a thesis statement that requires proof or defense and that may preview the structure of the argument.
